page.title: 14FLOWTON AND BUILDINGS
page.content: Flowton is a small village.It is the smallest village in our survey.The church roof is made of tiles,the rest is of flint and stone.It has a wooden gate with a cross on the top of it.The church is old and so are some of the trees around it. The Flowton sign has a plough in the inside of the square,on top of it is a bunch of corn with fancy squiggles around it. PROMINENT BUILDINGS IN OUR BLOCK FARMS:Fidgeon,Bullen Hall,Woodlands, Grove,Bush,Little Park,Lovetofts,Park, Street,Elm,Lower Dairy,Dairy,Rutters, Tye. COTTAGES:Keepers,Stone,Copenhagen. HALLS:Flowton,Little Blakenham. CHURCHES:Flowton,Somersham,Little Blakenham.
